text: Hello, I am Sanak Sharma. Thank you for considering my application and I believe this will end your search for the right candidate.
I am looking for an opportunity in the field of quantitative finance in an environment where I can challenge my epitopes and hone my skills and contribute to the growth of the organization.
I am currently pursuing my master's in management from IOC Bangalore and specializing in physics
analytics and data science.
I have been a scholar throughout my academic life and I scored a 10.0 in class 10 and 93.6%
in class 12.
I did my graduation in chemical engineering from NIT campus.
After my graduation, I joined 39 different state universities and worked there for 16 years for their master criteria unit.
I consider myself advanced in software like Excel and Matlab.
I am also very proficient in programming languages like Python and R which are the key tools for any statistical analysis of the data
I am a very inquisitive and curious learner which is evident from my research mindset.
During my graduation year, I presented papers in many conferences and won best paper award in one of them.
I believe my ability to research and go into the depths will help me find solutions to challenging problems in any organization.
I have been very fond of numbers and mathematics from my childhood.
I participated in math volunteers and ranked among top 15 in my students.
My affinity towards math and numbers makes me a great guide for the quantitative field of finance.
At last, I would like to add that my determination, integrity and perseverance sets me apart.
Also, my work experience helps me develop skills like people management and teamwork,
which makes me a great team player.
I would like to work for this eminent organization so that I can be the part of the journey where
organization has made great strides in the field of quantitative finance. Thank you very much.
